record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Change options" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: You can check for duplicate changes, access the database, and use Find and Fill options when opening, updating, or closing Change requests.
To check for duplicate Change requests, place the cursor in the appropriate field and press F1 (Duplicate).

detail.detail: Service Manager searches the existing Change requests and retrieves any Change records with matching field contents.
If it finds records, you can abort the new Change request due to duplication.
Press F6 (Information) to access the database to locate information in other tables.
Press F8 (Find) or F9 (Fill) get access to important data from other records in other tables.
Both of these options use the link table to give you access to information from more than one table.
- The Find option displays a target record.
- The Fill option populates fields in the source record with information from fields (with the same name) in the target record.
